overview: Cops, lawyers, judges, doctors, nurses and other professionals... all lesbian... are represented in this tail of women in their own world of on the job titillation. Sydney is a cop who is tired of her husband chasing women. She can't beat him so she decides to join him. She won't be a full fledged member of the sisterhood of lesbos till she passed induction at a local girl bar. Hint: it's a 7 girl orgy.
title: Sex Professionals
